Japan Center Garages Logo ContestLauren Aubrey Lee
UI/UX Designer | Graphic Designer | Illustrator | Community Builder
San Francisco, California, United States
Summary
I am a UX/UI Designer with 5+ years of Graphic Design and
Illustration experience. I aspire to create genuinely effective UI
designs by improving my designs according to users’ voiced
frustrations. My strengths in empathizing with both users and
engineers make me a strong team member that will not only ensure
the right design is created for the user, but also that the process of
building it goes as smoothly as possible. 
Technical Skills: UX Research, UI Design, Graphic Design,
Wireframing, Information Architecture, Prototyping, Interaction
Design, Branding, Visual Design, Illustration
Software: Figma, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Procreate,
Microsoft Office
Portfolio: https://www.laurenaubreylee.com/
Experience
Chop Dawg
UI/UX Designer
November 2022 - Present  (1 year)
• Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to
create user-centered designs for web and mobile applications.
• Create wireframes, user flows, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups using
Figma.
• Continuously iterate and improve designs based on user feedback, data
analysis, and industry trends.
Meetup
Event Organizer
July 2022 - Present  (1 year 4 months)
San Francisco Bay Area

bobabuddiessf/

interpersonal relationships among members through Meetup.

• Manage and maintain a Discord server to facilitate communication
and engagement among members, including moderating discussions,
troubleshooting technical issues, and enforcing community guidelines.
• Mediate and find solutions for all parties involved when disagreements
happen between members.
